name: Doremy's Sweet Dream Bubble
description:
Doremy's Sweet Dream Bubble! Doremy is hungry and needs to eat some dreams! Use Doremy's hat to bounce between dreams and cause a ruckus!
Controls:
Left Mouse: Drag Hat
Right Mouse: Pull Hat, let go to launch Doremy like a slingshot!

Escape: Pause

Thanks to everyone who participated! We may work on a longer version with more levels, better puzzles, and more polish! Maybe!
